node_id="2109641" parent_e2node="2109613" author_user="go ahead I'll listen">Fifteen words about love</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="2114792" parent_e2node="1950088" author_user="moeyz">Our music, in place of breadcrumbs, is there to help us find our way back home.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="go ahead I'll listen" node_id="1170305" parent_e2node="1047834" author_user="tandex">She is stupidly keeping herself a secret, when I know she has sparkly things to show me</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2106838" parent_e2node="1994065" author_user="haqiqat">Everything is made of sunlight and shit</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2114803" parent_e2node="1672957" author_user="Auspice">She who leaves men as flaming wrecks in the ditch on the side of the road in her wake, yea, even submarines</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="just1wheat" node_id="2114753" parent_e2node="2114751" author_user="etouffee">August 6, 2014</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="etouffee" node_id="1308759" parent_e2node="51941" author_user="asqui">QED</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="shaogo" node_id="2114760" parent_e2node="1500786" of Molossia</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="1752608" parent_e2node="776293" author_user="ehud">Four Quartets</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Auspice" node_id="2114786"
